```{html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>p5.sound Example</title>
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.4.0/p5.js"></script>
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.4.0/addons/p5.sound.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
  <button id="playButton">Play Sound</button>

  <script>
    let sound;

    function preload() {
      soundFormats('mp3', 'ogg');
      sound = loadSound('path_to_your_sound_file.mp3'); // Replace 'path_to_your_sound_file.mp3' with the actual path to your sound file
    }

    function setup() {
      let playButton = document.getElementById('playButton');
      playButton.addEventListener('click', playSound);
    }

    function playSound() {
      if (sound.isPlaying()) {
        sound.stop();
      } else {
        sound.play();
      }
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
```
